comment._content: That's why they call it America's pass time, images from the pass of baseball greats and stadiums are what makes baseball great....history.

comment.author: 43758249@N08
comment._content:
Terrific photo of Ty Cobb.  You can see in this one picture all those things that made him one of  a kind -- the athleticism, the attitude, the extraordinary focus and competitive drive and, yes, the meanness and the way he was always alone in a crowd, always with a chip on his shoulder and, in a team sport, without a friend in the world.

Great picture!

comment._content: wow,great photo and just look at the intensity that was Cobb. . . .WdT
